00083                 function ActiveRecord($_values = NULL)
00084                 {
00085                         global $db;
00086                         
00087                         $classname = get_class($this);
00088                         $initialized = self::_is_initialized($classname);
00089                         if (!$initialized)
00090                         {
00091                                 $db->prepare("DESCRIBE `{1}`",
00092                                         $this->get_table_name());
00093                                 $db->exec();
00094                                 $columns = array();
00095                                 while ($row = $db->fetch_assoc())
00096                                 {
00097                                         $columns[] = $row['Field'];
00098                                 }
00099                                 self::_set_columns($classname, $columns);
00100                                 self::_set_initialized($classname, TRUE);
00101                         }
00102                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00103                         if (!empty($_values))
00104                         {
00105                                 $this->values = array();
00106                                 foreach ($_values as $key => $val)
00107                                 {
00108                                         $keyexists = in_array($key, $columns);
00109                                         if ($keyexists)
00110                                         {
00111                                                 $this->values[$key] = (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) ? stripslashes($val) : $val;
00112                                         }
00113                                 }
00114                         }
00115                         $this->init($_values);
00116                 }

00126                 }

00137                         if (!$this->table_name)

00140                                 $this->table_name = class_name_to_table_name($classname);
00141                         }
00142                         return $this->table_name;
00143                 }

00181                 private function has_column($key)
00182                 {
00183                         $classname = get_class($this);
00184                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00185                         return in_array($key, $columns);
00186                 }

00192                 public function belongs_to($table_name)
00193                 {
00194                         $classname = get_class($this);
00195                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00196                         $ownerclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00197                         $owner = eval("return new {$ownerclass}();");
00198                         if (in_array(table_name_to_foreign_key($table_name), $columns))
00199                         {
00200                                 $owner->find_by_id($this->values[table_name_to_foreign_key($table_name)]);
00201                         }
00202                         else if (in_array($owner->foreign_key_name, $columns))
00203                         {
00204                                 $owner->find_by_id($this->values[$owner->foreign_key_name]);
00205                         }
00206                         $this->values[singularize($table_name)] = $owner;
00207                         $owner->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00208                 }

00216                 public function has_many($table_name, $params = array())
00217                 {
00218                         $childclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00219                         $obj = eval("return new {$childclass}();");
00220                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00221                         if (isset($params['where_clause']))
00222                         {
00223                                 $params['where_clause'] = "({$params['where_clause']}) AND `{$fkey}` = '{$this->values[$this->primary_key]}' ";
00224                         }
00225                         else
00226                         {
00227                                 $params['where_clause'] = "`{$fkey}` = '{$this->values[$this->primary_key]}' ";
00228                         }
00229                         $children = $obj->find_all($params);
00230                         if (count($children) > 0)
00231                         {
00232                                 foreach ($children as $child)
00233                                 {
00234                                         $child->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00235                                 }
00236                                 $this->values[$table_name] = $children;
00237                         }
00238                 }

00246                 public function has_and_belongs_to_many($table_name, $params = array())
00247                 {
00248                         global $db;
00249                         
00250                         $peerclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00251                         $peer = eval("return new {$peerclass}();");
00252                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00253                         $peer_fkey = $peer->get_foreign_key_name();
00254                         
00255                         // By convention, relation table name is the union of
00256                         // the two member tables' names joined by an underscore
00257                         // in alphabetical order
00258                         $table_names = array($table_name, $this->table_name);
00259                         sort($table_names);
00260                         $relation_table = implode('_', $table_names);
00261                         
00262                         $db->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE `{2}` = '{3}'",
00263                                 $relation_table,
00264                                 $fkey,
00265                                 $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00266                         $result = $db->exec();
00267                         //print_r($db->query);
00268                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00269                         {
00270                                 $this->values[$table_name] = array();
00271                                 while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00272                                 {
00273                                         $peer = eval("return new {$peerclass}();");
00274                                         $peer->find_by_id($row[$peer_fkey]);
00275                                         $this->values[$table_name][] = $peer;
00276                                         $peer->values[$this->table_name] = array($this);
00277                                         //print_r($peer);
00278                                 }
00279                         }
00280                 }

00288                 public function has_one($table_name)
00289                 {
00290                         $childclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00291                         $obj = eval("return new {$childclass}();");
00292                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00293                         $children = $obj->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`{$fkey}` = {$this->values[$this->primary_key]}", 'limit' => 1));
00294                         if (count($children) > 0)
00295                         {
00296                                 $child = $children[0];
00297                                 $child->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00298                                 $this->values[singularize($table_name)] = $child;
00299                         }
00300                 }

00314                         global $db;
00315                         
00316                         $db->prepare($query);
00317                         $result = $db->exec();
00318                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00319                         {
00320                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00321                                 $results = array();
00322                                 // FIXME: 
00323                                 while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00324                                 {
00325                                         $obj = eval("return new {$classname}();");
00326                                         $obj->find_by_id($row[$this->primary_key]);
00327                                         $results[] = $obj;
00328                                 }
00329                                 return $results;
00330                         }
00331                         else
00332                         {
00333                                 // throw new Exception... PHP 5 only
00334                                 return NULL;
00335                         }

00348                 function find_all($params = array())
00349                 {
00350                         global $db;
00351                         
00352                         if (empty($params['where_clause']))
00353                         {
00354                                 $params['where_clause'] = '1';
00355                         }
00356                         if (empty($params['order_by']))
00357                         {
00358                                 $params['order_by'] = "`{$this->primary_key}` ASC";
00359                         }
00360                         if (empty($params['limit']))
00361                         {
00362                                 $params['limit'] = 999;
00363                         }
00364                         if (empty($params['start']))
00365                         {
00366                                 $params['start'] = 0;
00367                         }
00368                         
00369                         $db->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE (1 AND ({$params['where_clause']})) ORDER BY {$params['order_by']} LIMIT {$params['start']}, {$params['limit']}",
00370                                 $this->get_table_name());
00371                         $result = $db->exec();
00372                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00373                         {
00374                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00375                                 $results = array();
00376                                 // FIXME: 
00377                                 while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00378                                 {
00379                                         $obj = eval("return new {$classname}();");
00380                                         $obj->find_by_id($row[$this->primary_key]);
00381                                         $results[] = $obj;
00382                                 }
00383                                 return $results;
00384                         }
00385                         else
00386                         {
00387                                 // throw new Exception... PHP 5 only
00388                                 return NULL;
00389                         }
00390                 }

00400                 static function find($id, $classname = 'ActiveRecord')
00401                 {
00402                         $obj = new $classname();
00403                         $obj->find_by_id($id);
00404                         return $obj;

00414                 public function find_by_id($id)
00415                 {
00416                         global $db;
00417                         
00418                         $db->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1",
00419                                 $this->get_table_name(),
00420                                 $id);
00421                         $db->exec();
00422                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00423                         {
00424                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00425                                 $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00426                                 $values = $db->fetch_assoc();
00427                                 foreach ($columns as $column)
00428                                 {
00429                                         $this->values[$column] = $values[$column];
00430                                 }
00431                                 self::_add_to_pool($classname, $id, $this);
00432                         }
00433                         else
00434                         {
00435                                 return FALSE;
00436                         }
00437                         return TRUE;
00438                 }

00449                 public function save()
00450                 {
00451                         global $db;
00452                         
00453                         $classname = get_class($this);
00454                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00455 
00456                         $nonempty = array();
00457                         for ($i = 0; $i < count($columns); $i++)
00458                         {
00459                                 if (isset($this->values[$columns[$i]]))
00460                                 {
00461                                         $nonempty[] = $columns[$i];
00462                                 }
00463                         }
00464 
00465                         if (!empty($this->values[$this->primary_key]))
00466                         {
00467                                 $query = "UPDATE `{1}` SET ";
00468                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00469                                 {
00470                                         $query .= "`{$nonempty[$i]}` = '{$db->escape($this->values[$nonempty[$i]])}'";
00471                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00472                                         {
00473                                                 $query .= ", ";
00474                                         }
00475                                 }
00476                                 $query .= " WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1";
00477                                 $db->prepare($query,
00478                                         $this->get_table_name(),
00479                                         $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00480                                 $db->exec();
00481                         }
00482                         else
00483                         {
00484                                 $query = "INSERT INTO `{1}` (";
00485                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00486                                 {
00487                                         $query .= "`{$nonempty[$i]}`";
00488                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00489                                         {
00490                                                 $query .= ", ";
00491                                         }
00492                                 }
00493                                 $query .= ") VALUES (";
00494                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00495                                 {
00496                                         $query .= "'{$db->escape($this->values[$nonempty[$i]])}'";
00497                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00498                                         {
00499                                                 $query .= ", ";
00500                                         }
00501                                 }
00502                                 $query .= ")";
00503                                 $db->prepare($query,
00504                                         $this->get_table_name());
00505                                 $db->exec();
00506                                 $this->values[$this->primary_key] = mysql_insert_id();
00507                         }
00508                         return TRUE;
00509                 }

00519                 public function delete($optimize = TRUE)
00520                 {
00521                         global $db;
00522                         
00523                         if (!empty($this->values[$this->primary_key]))
00524                         {
00525                                 $db->prepare("DELETE FROM `{1}` WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1",
00526                                         $this->get_table_name(),
00527                                         $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00528                                 $db->exec();
00529                                 
00530                                 // Clean up
00531                                 if ($optimize)
00532                                 {
00533                                         $db->prepare("OPTIMIZE TABLE `{1}`",
00534                                                 $this->get_table_name());
00535                                         $db->exec();
00536                                 }
00537                         }
00538                 }

00557                 public function permalink($relative = TRUE)
00558                 {
00559                         $relative_url = $this->relative_url();
00560                         return $relative ?
00561                                 sprintf('%s%s',
00562                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00563                                         $relative_url) :
00564                                 sprintf('http://%s%s%s',
00565                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00566                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00567                                         $relative_url);
00568                 }

00582                 public function __set($key, $value)
00583                 {
00584                         if ($this->has_column($key))
00585                         {
00586                                 $this->values[$key] = $value;
00587                         }
00588                         else
00589                         {
00590                                 $this->$key = $value;
00591                         }
00592                 }
00593 
00598                 public function __get($key)
00599                 {
00600                         if (array_key_exists($key, $this->values))
00601                         {
00602                                 return $this->values[$key];
00603                         }
00604                         else if (isset($this->$key))
00605                         {
00606                                 return $this->$key;
00607                         }
00608                         return NULL;
00609                 }

00615                 public function __isset($key)
00616                 {
00617                         if (!(isset($this->values) && !empty($this->values)))
00618                         {
00619                                 return FALSE;
00620                         }
00621                         if (array_key_exists($key, $this->values))
00622                         {
00623                                 return TRUE;
00624                         }
00625                         else if (isset($this->$key))
00626                         {
00627                                 return TRUE;
00628                         }
00629                         return FALSE;
00630                 }

00650                 private static function _is_initialized($classname)
00651                 {
00652                         if (!isset(self::$class_initialized[$classname]))
00653                         {
00654                                 return FALSE;
00655                         }
00656                         return self::$class_initialized[$classname];

00674                 {
00675                         if (!isset(self::$class_initialized[$classname]))

00677                                 return NULL;
00678                         }
00679                         return self::$columns[$classname];

00688                 private static function _add_to_pool($classname, $id, $obj)
00689                 {
00690                         if (!isset(self::$object_pool[$classname]))
00691                         {
00692                                 self::$object_pool[$classname] = array();
00693                         }
00694                         self::$object_pool[$classname][$id] = $obj;
00695                 }
00696                 
00702                 private static function _get_from_pool($classname, $id)
00703                 {
00704                         if (!isset(self::$object_pool[$classname]) ||
00705                                 !isset(self::$object_pool[$classname][$id]))
00706                         {
00707                                 return NULL;
00708                         }
00709                         return self::$object_pool[$classname][$id];
00710                 }
00711         }

00713         if (version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5') < 0)
00714         {
00715                 if (function_exists("overload"))
00716                 {
00717                         overload('ActiveRecord');
00718                 }
